meanings.definition: A small drop or lump of a thick or viscous substance.
meanings.sent1: The blobs of paint on the canvas blended together beautifully.
meanings.sent2: She scooped up the blobs of dough to make cookies.
meanings.sent3: The blobs of jelly on his sandwich seemed to have a mind of their own.
meanings.sent4: The blobs of clouds in the sky looked like fluffy cotton candy.
meanings.sent5: The blobs of glue stuck the pieces together firmly.

meanings.definition: A shapeless mass or lump of something.
meanings.sent1: The blobs of clay on the pottery wheel slowly took shape.
meanings.sent2: He tripped over the blobs of clothes scattered on the floor.
meanings.sent3: The blobs of mashed potatoes on his plate resembled a mountain range.
meanings.sent4: The blobs of shadows in the dark alley made it seem even more ominous.
meanings.sent5: The blobs of playdough squished easily between her fingers.
